data.oai_dc:dc: Reflectance measurements (ASD LabSpec5000) of different surface types from Arctic sea ice acquired during POLARSTERN cruise PS106

ASD measurements are in units of irradiance reflectance. Every spectrum has an individual timestamp. Positions of each spectrum can be localized by joining the GPS data with the spectral data on the datetime of the measurement.

Arctic Ocean, ARK-XXXI/1.1,PASCAL, Event label, File content, File format, File name, File size, ICE, Ice station, Number, Polarstern, PS106_22-1, PS106_24-2, PS106_32-2, PS106/1, Uniform resource locator/link to file
